alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Gulf, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 242 PM EDT/142 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wewahitchka, or 20 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Kern, Wilma, Kinard, Lewis, Chipola Cutoff, Willis Landing, Broad Branch, Chipola Park and Dalkeith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
